key_points.text: Analysts forecast second-quarter 2026 EPS of $1.73 (up 12% year-over-year), which underpins the dividend increase but suggests earnings growth is tracking closely with expectations.

Positive Sentiment:
Quarterly dividend raised to $1.80 per share (annualized yield of 2.3%), signaling management’s confidence in cash flow and capital strength.
3 Dividend Stocks Raising Payouts—and Backing It Up With Results
Neutral Sentiment:
Wells Fargo & Company (WFC) shares are trading higher today following a dividend boost and encouraging analyst forecasts that underscore the bank’s stable fundamentals and income appeal.
